Package wrath.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EntryObject
    The interface that denotes an object that is used to launch the game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientUtils
    General static utilities library.
    EntryPoint
    This is the entry class of the engine.
    ExternalPluginManager
    Class to act as a portal between external applications and the Game class.
    Game
    The entry point and base of the game.
    JavaEntryObject
    The class to launch the game off of a Java jar called 'game.jar' in the 'assets' folder.
    PythonEntryObject
    The class to launch the game off of a python script called 'initscript.py' in the 'assets' folder.
